response.overview: Juan Carlos suffers from paranoid schizophrenia for more than 30 years. He lives with his mother, and attends the CRIS (Social Reinsertion Center) every day, where he lives with other users with similar diagnoses such as Bea, a hyperactive woman who will become his best friend, or Hippie, who dreams of becoming a rock singer. Together with Miguel, an actor with a serious personal crisis, they create a theatrical show, inspired by texts by Samuel Beckett. What begins as a CRIS workshop, will end up becoming a way to freely express their emotions and feelings.
response.title: Beckett y el rinoceronte blanco
